snippet: Lorne Adrain dropped out of Providence’s mayoral race on Monday, a decision that could make the path to victory harder for the former mayor and two-time felon Vincent A. Cianci Jr.
abstract: Lorne Adrain drops out of mayoral race in Providence, RI, decision that could make path to victory harder for former mayor and two-time felon Vincent A Cianci Jr.
lead_paragraph: Lorne Adrain dropped out of Providence’s mayoral race on Monday, a decision that could make the path to victory harder for the former mayor and two-time felon Vincent A. Cianci Jr.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Independent Drops Out of Race for Mayor of Providence
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Independent Drops Out of Race for Mayor of Providence
